text:
ACT SAT PREP Learn how to determine the final weight given a ratio of weights

[imath] \mathbf{7} [/imath]\n[imath] \mathbf{O} [/imath]\nA certain mixture of trail mix contains peanuts, raisins and sesame seeds in a ratio of 2: 4: 5\nby weight. How many ounces of the mixture can be made with 10 ounces of peanuts?
